data.title: Delicious
data.text: Stopped at Jozettie's Cupcakes for dessert and was pleasantly surprised.  The location is not the best but, the cake and cupcakes were absolutely delicious.  We will definitely return when visiting Montgomery.

data.title: Cupcakes To Die For
data.text: I would put these up against any cupcakes in the country. They might not have the 'look' that some of these chain cupcake bakeries have, but do you buy a cupcake to look at it or eat it? These have the best flavor you can imagine. They have many amazing flavors including German Chocolate, Pecan Pie, Lemon, Red Velvet, Chocolate, Pineapple Upsidedown, Sweet Potato, Carrot and many more. If you are staying downtown they are just a few minute drive and I promise you will not be disappointed.

data.title: This is how to do cupcakes!
data.text: I don't care WHAT you order here, you can taste the love.  This is a teeny tiny little place with barely enough room to turn around in, but the cupcakes are pure heaven.  Miss Jozettie clearly loves what she does.  Fair warning, though - if you have a favorite don't count on it being in the case just because it's on the menu.  These lovely little cakes sell out fast so if you have something special in mind, place a special order ahead of time.

data.title: Oh my goodness, those cupcakes!
data.text: Hands down, these are the best cupcakes I have ever eaten in my life! They are amazing! The focus is not on the icing, like some other companies in Montgomery, but on the cake, which is moist and just yummy! My favorite is the carrot cake, but I haven't had one that wasn't wonderful!

data.title: What a jewel!
data.text: This was my first visit to Jozettie's. My friend has raved about these cupcakes for years! Wow! They are good. I had the strawberry shortcake cupcake, and my Mother had the key lime cupcake! Can't wait for my next visit to Montgomery and then to Jozettie's.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: We stopped here in search of the best cupcakes in town, and we hit the gold mine with this discovery!

data.title: AMAZING
data.text:
Get your treats here. They are so nice and the cupcakes are wonderful.
Try the red velvet-cheesecake cupcake.

data.title: Yum Yum!!!!
data.text: The red velvet cheesecake is delicious. I don't usually buy red velvet flavored cakes and cupcakes while I'm out because it never tastes quite right. However, the red velvet cheesecake cake was recommended to me so I tried it. It tastes just like homemade red velvet cake and homemade cheesecake and is absolutely delicious.  I can't wait to try some more flavors.

data.title: My Favorite Dessert Spot
data.text: I love this place! The cupcake shop itself is a small, unassuming family-owned & operated place but do not let that fool you. The flavors here have BIG Southern personality and so does the staff! I've noticed that the staff knows a lot of their customers by name (me included) or at least by what they regularly order. Even when they are busy they are always polite and patient. They are constantly baking throughout the day so the shop smells divine. Typically they have 10 or so flavors to choose from so everyone can find a flavor to fit their fancy. My only complaint is that they are not open 7 days a week for me to get my fix!
